name: unwilled
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
done or happening without the decision or intention of the person involved: An unwilled tear trickled down the side of his face. I do not want to induce unwilled behaviour in the people who ask me for advice. Related word
will
More examplesFewer examplesAccording to the law, you can't be held responsible for an unwilled reflex action.The patterns that are created by this process appear to be unwilled and unpredictable.A sudden and unwilled memory of paddling on the beach as a young child occurred to her.
